Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of seven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393865) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393865)
